lead_paragraph: The men were arrested on Tuesday, transferred to the country’s main counterterrorism center in Tunis, the capital, and then apparently handed over to American officials.

headline.print_headline: Tunisia Holds 2 From U.S. on Suspicion of Terror Ties
headline.main: Tunisia Briefly Holds Two From U.S. on Suspicion of Terror Ties

snippet: The men were arrested on Tuesday, transferred to the country’s main counterterrorism center in Tunis, the capital, and then apparently handed over to American officials....
abstract: Tunisian police officials report detention of American brothers Nathan and Patrick Lawwliss on suspicion of involvement with terrorist activities; men have since been released, reportedly driven away in United States Embassy car.
